+ WARNING: THE FOLLOWING FILE IS LEVEL 7/DONK CLASSIFIED 
----
+++ ANY ATTEMPT TO ACCESS THIS FILE WITHOUT LEVEL 7/DONK AUTHORIZATION WILL BE LOGGED AND WILL LEAD TO IMMEDIATE GOAT TRAMPLING.

[[include component:image-block
    name=dr|
    caption=Dr. Akimoto and SCP-████, moments before dropping a new mixtape.|
    width=300px
]]
[[/=]]
> **Name:** Dr. Michael Akimoto
> 
> **Serial Number:** 77-19VKW
> 
> **Security Clearance:** Level 1
> 
> **Positions:** --Operational Staff / Site Crit / Community Outreach - Seminar Team / Internet Outreach / IRC Chat Op / Butterfly Squad--
> 
> **Sites of Operations:** Parazoology Division Site-71, Maximum Security Site-51 
> 
@@ @@
Howdy, Y'all! Welcome to Site-71, or "The Farm" as we like to say. I'm DrAkimoto, I'm not one to talk about myself but here are some things I'm into.
* Goats
* Donks
* Other animals
* Space stuff
* All sorts of music
* Farming
* Art
* Orange Juice
* Chickens
I'm sure there's other stuff but who cares! 
@@ @@
